miniChallenges.title: The One Minute TED Talk
miniChallenges.inputText: In 200 words, a researcher explains how climate change affects coral reefs through ocean acidification and temperature stress.
miniChallenges.idealAnswer: Climate change heats and acidifies oceans, bleaching coral reefs and unraveling the delicate balance of marine life.

miniChallenges.title: Fix the Press Release
miniChallenges.inputText: Our new product might be useful for some people, though we are still figuring out its actual purpose.
miniChallenges.idealAnswer: We proudly introduce a product built to make everyday work faster, smarter, and more purposeful for every user.

miniChallenges.title: Grammar Detective
miniChallenges.inputText: Each students were asked to submit their essays before Friday, but most of them forgets the deadline.
miniChallenges.idealAnswer: Each student was asked to submit an essay before Friday, but most forgot the deadline.

miniChallenges.title: Decode the Loop
miniChallenges.inputText: nums = [2, 4, 6, 8]; total = 0; for n in nums: total += n; print(total)
miniChallenges.idealAnswer: The program loops through the numbers 2, 4, 6, and 8, adds them to total, and prints 20 as the sum.

miniChallenges.title: Make It Sound Smart
miniChallenges.inputText: The movie was kind of good but had boring parts.
miniChallenges.idealAnswer: The film tells a compelling story yet loses momentum in slower scenes that soften its dramatic impact.

miniChallenges.title: The Executive Brief
miniChallenges.inputText: The company increased its renewable energy investment by 45 percent, expanded into three new markets, and launched an employee training initiative on sustainability.
miniChallenges.idealAnswer: The company strengthened its sustainability agenda through larger renewable investments, market expansion, and employee training.

miniChallenges.title: Polish the Email
miniChallenges.inputText: hey sir i send the report yesturday please check and give me feedback asap thanks
miniChallenges.idealAnswer: Dear Sir, I sent the report yesterday and would appreciate your feedback at your earliest convenience. Thank you.

miniChallenges.title: Explain the Mystery Function
miniChallenges.inputText: def mystery(x): return x[::-1]
miniChallenges.idealAnswer: The function returns the reverse of its input. For example, mystery('hello') produces 'olleh'.

miniChallenges.title: Positive Spin Doctor
miniChallenges.inputText: The team failed to meet the deadline because of multiple mistakes.
miniChallenges.idealAnswer: The team turned earlier mistakes into valuable insights and refined its workflow for stronger future performance.

miniChallenges.title: Tweet Sized Summary
miniChallenges.inputText: In a world where people are increasingly dependent on technology, human interaction is becoming rare, affecting mental health and empathy.
miniChallenges.idealAnswer: Technology connects minds but separates hearts, reducing empathy and genuine human connection.

miniChallenges.title: The Late Submission
miniChallenges.inputText: hi prof i missed class and could not finish the assignment can i get some extra time
miniChallenges.idealAnswer: Dear Professor, I missed class due to personal reasons and kindly request a brief extension for the assignment.

miniChallenges.title: Code in Action
miniChallenges.inputText: def add_nums(a, b): return a + b
miniChallenges.idealAnswer: The function adds two numbers and returns their sum. For instance, add_nums(3, 7) returns 10.

miniChallenges.title: Tight Summary
miniChallenges.inputText: Artificial intelligence is helping students write better essays by suggesting improvements in tone, grammar, and structure while reducing teacher workload.
miniChallenges.idealAnswer: AI tools enhance student writing by improving tone, grammar, and structure while reducing teacher workload.

miniChallenges.title: Kind Feedback
miniChallenges.inputText: Your answer is wrong and you did not follow the instructions.
miniChallenges.idealAnswer: You have made a thoughtful start, but your response missed some instructions. Review them carefully to strengthen your answer.

miniChallenges.title: Clear the Confusion
miniChallenges.inputText: The model are running slow because there is to many users at once.
miniChallenges.idealAnswer: The model is running slowly because there are too many users accessing it at once.

miniChallenges.title: Explain the Sort
miniChallenges.inputText: def sort_numbers(nums): return sorted(nums)
miniChallenges.idealAnswer: The function takes a list of numbers and returns a new list sorted in ascending order.

miniChallenges.title: Project Report Headline
miniChallenges.inputText: The AI project improved response accuracy by 30 percent and reduced latency by 25 percent after optimizing model architecture.
miniChallenges.idealAnswer: Model optimizations boosted accuracy by 30 percent and cut response time by a quarter, delivering faster smarter AI.

miniChallenges.title: Rewrite the Apology
miniChallenges.inputText: sorry for the delay we totally forgot to send the file earlier

miniChallenges.title: Debug the Function
miniChallenges.inputText: def avg(nums): return sum(nums)/len(nums)
miniChallenges.idealAnswer: The function computes the average of a list by dividing the sum of its elements by their count.
